pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Model Averaging with INLA // Spatial Econometrics models using Bayesian Model Averaging on models fitted with INLA. The INLA package can be obtained from http://www.r-inla.org . We recommend the testing version, which can be downloaded by running: source("http://www.math.ntnu.no/inla/givemeINLA- testing.R")
